content.question: Urban life in the major European cities during the Industrial Revolution was characterized by

choices.label: rapid social mobility among recent migrants from the countryside
overcrowded living conditions and unsafe working conditions for the working poor
the adoption of laissez-faire attitudes by industrial workers
government control of major industrial companies
an increase in the nobilityâ€™s power over the urban population

content.answer: overcrowded living conditions and unsafe working conditions for the working poor

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
